QuestData.Title: A Gift For Fish
QuestData.Description: That Fish Fellreed is kind of weird. First of all, her name's Fish. That's weird.$b$bOnce you talk to her, though, she's really a nice lady. Did you know that she's an animal lover?$b$bI've got an idea! The Kunzen hozen, in the mountains to the west, make little animal statues and put them in their huts to scare off bad guys. I bet Fish would LOVE something weird like that!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Ha ha! Her name is Fish.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Yak Statuette from the inside of a Kunzen hozen hut.
